mapper.select: SELECT m1.icon, m1.hide_children_in_menu, m1.ui_key, m1.sort, m1.locale, m1.parent_id, m1.hide_in_menu, m1.path, m1.component, m1.authority, m1.NAME, m2.path as parentKey FROM sys_menu m1 LEFT JOIN sys_menu m2 ON m1.parent_id = m2.id WHERE m1.del_flag = '0' ORDER BY m1.parent_id ASC, m1.sort ASC
